title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Role-Play Integrated Instructional Design for TPACK-Based Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital device utilization skills and foundational language education concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners apply the 7 knowledge domains of the TPACK framework to actual language teaching scenarios
Learners design and implement role-play-based language teaching activities using mobile devices
Learners perform a process of improving TPACK integration strategies by reflecting on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
